LanguageData.AbilityDef.ARA_EggSpew_Base.comps.li.fai: Not enough nutrition, needs to feed
LanguageData.AbilityDef.ARA_EggSpew_Base.comps.li: Ovary damaged or missing, unable to reproduce
LanguageData.ThingDef.ARA_CocoonSpew_Base_Proj.label: Arachnae Incubation Cocoon
Not enough nutrition, needs to feed
LanguageData.AbilityDef.ARA_EggSpew.label: Lay Egg
LanguageData.AbilityDef.ARA_EggSpew.description: Ejects a dormant egg from the ovary. An Arachnae Queen can interact with it to activate it and select the type of overseer insectoid to hatch. Consult the egg's specific information to understand the characteristics of each overseer.\n\nThis egg can only hatch small insectoids.
LanguageData.AbilityDef.ARA_EggSpew_Huge.label: Lay Large Egg
LanguageData.AbilityDef.ARA_EggSpew_Huge.description: Ejects a dormant large egg from the ovary. An Arachnae Queen can interact with it to activate it and select the type of overseer insectoid to hatch. Consult the egg's specific information to understand the characteristics of each overseer.\n\nThis egg can only hatch large insectoids.
LanguageData.AbilityDef.ARA_EggSpew_Huge.comps.li: Lvl 0 Large Arachnae Egg - Hatchable Units
LanguageData.AbilityDef.ARA_EggSpew_1Stage.label: Lay Egg - Tier 1
LanguageData.AbilityDef.ARA_EggSpew_1Stage.descriptio: Ejects a dormant egg from the ovary. An Arachnae Queen can interact with it to activate it and select the type of overseer insectoid to hatch. Consult the egg's specific information to understand the characteristics of each overseer.\n\nThis egg can only hatch small insectoids.
LanguageData.AbilityDef.ARA_EggSpew_Huge_1Stage.label: Lay Large Egg - Tier 1
LanguageData.AbilityDef.ARA_EggSpew_Huge_1Stage.descr: Ejects a dormant large egg from the ovary. An Arachnae Queen can interact with it to activate it and select the type of overseer insectoid to hatch. Consult the egg's specific information to understand the characteristics of each overseer.\n\nThis egg can only hatch large insectoids.
LanguageData.AbilityDef.ARA_EggSpew_Huge_1Stage.comps: Lvl 1 Large Arachnae Egg - Hatchable Units
LanguageData.AbilityDef.ARA_EggSpew_2Stage.label: Lay Egg - Tier 2
LanguageData.AbilityDef.ARA_EggSpew_2Stage.descriptio: Ejects a dormant egg from the ovary. An Arachnae Queen can interact with it to activate it and select the type of overseer insectoid to hatch. Consult the egg's specific information to understand the characteristics of each overseer.\n\nThis egg can only hatch small insectoids.
LanguageData.AbilityDef.ARA_EggSpew_Huge_2Stage.label: Lay Large Egg - Tier 2
LanguageData.AbilityDef.ARA_EggSpew_Huge_2Stage.descr: Ejects a dormant large egg from the ovary. An Arachnae Queen can interact with it to activate it and select the type of overseer insectoid to hatch. Consult the egg's specific information to understand the characteristics of each overseer.\n\nThis egg can only hatch large insectoids.
LanguageData.AbilityDef.ARA_EggSpew_Huge_2Stage.comps: Lvl 2 Large Arachnae Egg - Hatchable Units
LanguageData.AbilityDef.ARA_EggSpew_Techprint.label: Lay Gen-Testing Egg
LanguageData.AbilityDef.ARA_EggSpew_Techprint.descrip: Ejects a special egg from the ovary. It cannot hatch any overseer insectoid, but can be activated by an Arachnae Queen to hatch specific techprints.\n\nThis egg requires a large amount of biosynths to sustain, and what can be researched depends on the research completion status at the moment it is laid. Technologies that are not yet unlocked cannot have their techprints hatched.
LanguageData.AbilityDef.ARA_EggSpew_Techprint.comps.l: Requires tech node ESS-5 "Biosynth Extraction" to unlock the ability
LanguageData.AbilityDef.ARA_Cocoon_Cloth.label: Fabric Incubation Cocoon
LanguageData.AbilityDef.ARA_Cocoon_Cloth.description: Deploys a fabric cocoon containing nutrients and genetic material that can hatch a set of basic fabric gear. Consult the cocoon's hyperlink to understand the characteristics of all the equipment it can produce.
LanguageData.AbilityDef.ARA_Cocoon_Medicine.label: Medical Incubation Cocoon
LanguageData.AbilityDef.ARA_Cocoon_Medicine.descripti: Deploys a medical cocoon containing nutrients and genetic material that can hatch a set of basic medical supplies. Consult the cocoon's hyperlink to understand the characteristics of all the equipment it can produce.
LanguageData.AbilityDef.ARA_Cocoon_Weapon.label: Weapon Incubation Cocoon
LanguageData.AbilityDef.ARA_Cocoon_Weapon.description: Deploys a weapon cocoon containing nutrients and genetic material that can hatch a set of basic weapons. Consult the cocoon's hyperlink to understand the characteristics of all the equipment it can produce.
LanguageData.AbilityDef.ARA_Cocoon_CorpseCloth.label: Corpse Transformation - Fabric
LanguageData.AbilityDef.ARA_Cocoon_CorpseCloth.descri: Transforms a corpse into a fabric cocoon containing nutrients and genetic material that can hatch a set of basic fabric gear. Consult the cocoon's hyperlink to understand the characteristics of all the equipment it can produce.
LanguageData.AbilityDef.ARA_Cocoon_CorpseMedicine.des: Transforms a corpse into a medical cocoon containing nutrients and genetic material that can hatch a set of basic medical supplies. Consult the cocoon's hyperlink to understand the characteristics of all the equipment it can produce.
LanguageData.AbilityDef.ARA_Cocoon_CorpseWeapon.label: Corpse Transformation - Weapon
LanguageData.AbilityDef.ARA_Cocoon_CorpseWeapon.descr: Transforms a corpse into a weapon cocoon containing nutrients and genetic material that can hatch a set of basic weapons. Consult the cocoon's hyperlink to understand the characteristics of all the equipment it can produce.
